name: Last Person In Chernobyl Simulator VR
name_original: Last Person In Chernobyl Simulator VR
description:
Na Zdorovie Comrade,

As you have probably noticed nuclear reactor is not so good and will soon explode.

That is no reason to stop working, the motherland needs you, and you have been randomly selected as a volonteer to keep this nuclear plant running a bit longer!

Keep those gauges all the way up, keep adding fuel to the reactor and you might get a few extra seconds of helping our great nation!

Controls:

- Left Joystick: Move

- Right Joystick: Snap rotate

- Grab buttons: Grag things

Rules: 

- Do the tasks required to keep the indicators all maxed out! If they reach zero the meltdown will happend faster!
